events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund because I do not want to keep this product.
The case has been categorized under refund due to the customer's request for a money back after receiving an incorrect product.
An agent specialized in refunds has been assigned to handle this customer's case to ensure proper assistance.
Hello! Thank you for contacting support. I’m sorry to hear about the mix-up with your order. Let’s get this sorted out for you as quickly as possible.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received? This will help us process your refund faster.
Sure, my order number is 123456789 and I’ve attached a photo showing the item I got which is different from what I ordered.
Thank you for the info. We will initiate a full refund to your payment method within 3 to 5 business days. Please keep the item, no need to return it.
Thanks for your help! I appreciate not having to return the item and look forward to receiving the refund soon.
The refund process has been completed on our side. You should see the amount back in your account shortly. Please contact us if you have any further questions.
Just checking in to confirm that you have received the refund and everything is resolved to your satisfaction. Let us know if there’s anything else we can assist with.
As we have received confirmation of refund receipt, this case will now be closed. Thank you for reaching out to us and have a great day!
We have sent you a short survey to rate your experience with our support team. Your feedback helps us improve our service.
